code: @Test public void servletContextAwareWithServletContext() {     ServletContext servletContext = new MockServletContext().     ServletContextAwareProcessor processor = new ServletContextAwareProcessor(servletContext).     ServletContextAwareBean bean = new ServletContextAwareBean().     assertNull(bean.getServletContext()).     processor.postProcessBeforeInitialization(bean, "testBean").     assertNotNull("ServletContext should have been set", bean.getServletContext()).     assertEquals(servletContext, bean.getServletContext()). }
